review.title: “Review on Management”
review.pros: Pros – - Flexible work atmosphere at times- Nothing much to think of
review.cons: Cons – - Poor Management- No proper structure, process defined- Too much partiality over selected people- No follow up on work & too much of internal politics involved- Proper hike, incentives was always a NO in the organization- Absolutely no job security, can be shown the doors anytime
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – - Kindly review the entire work flow- Haphazard processes hamper the work culture which needs to be checked
